title: Assistant Get?
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Kanata-san, this no-bake cheesecake is really delicious!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ehehe~, the cheesecake loving Kotori-chan praised me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>There’s something in it.... Is it raisins?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Fufufu~. Kanata put raisins, raspberries, and walnuts that have been boiled down in apple juice and spices in it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Waaah, that’s amazing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata saw a cake that used berries soaked in rum on a book, so Kanata wondered if Kanata could make something similar that we all can eat and tried this~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>That’s so nice, I want to try making sweets like this too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Then, would you accompany me next time? Kanata wants to research more and more sweets~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Can I really join you!? I would love to!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yaaay~! Kanata got an assistant!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
